                    442
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    443
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    444
                    6x
                    
                      
    lst_denominator <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    445
                    6x
                    
                      
      rep_named(

                    		
                  

                  

                    446
                    6x
                    
                      
        variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    447
                    6x
                    
                      
        list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    448
                    6x
                    
                      
          .table_as_df(

                    		
                  

                  

                    449
                    6x
                    
                      
            denominator,

                    		
                  

                  

                    450
                    6x
                    
                      
            by = intersect(by, names(denominator)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    451
                    6x
                    
                      
            strata = intersect(strata, names(denominator)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    452
                    6x
                    
                      
            count_column = "...ard_N...",

                    		
                  

                  

                    453
                    6x
                    
                      
            useNA = "always"

                    		
                  

                  

                    454
                    
                    
                      
          ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    455
                    6x
                    
                      
            tidyr::drop_na(any_of(c(by, strata)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    456
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    457
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    458
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    459
                    
                    
                      
  # if user requested cell percentages

                    		
                  

                  

                    460
                    7x
                    
                      
  else if (isTRUE(denominator %in% "cell")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    461
                    3x
                    
                      
    lst_denominator <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    462
                    3x
                    
                      
      lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    463
                    3x
                    
                      
        variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    464
                    3x
                    
                      
        function(variable) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    465
                    5x
                    
                      
          dplyr::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    466
                    5x
                    
                      
            ...ard_N... =

                    		
                  

                  

                    467
                    5x
                    
                      
              tidyr::drop_na(data, all_of(c(by, strata, variable))) |> nrow()

                    		
                  

                  

                    468
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    469
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    470
                    
                    
                      
      ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    471
                    3x
                    
                      
      stats::setNames(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    472
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    473
                    
                    
                      
  # if user requested row percentages

                    		
                  

                  

                    474
                    4x
                    
                      
  else if (isTRUE(denominator %in% "row")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    475
                    2x
                    
                      
    lst_denominator <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    476
                    2x
                    
                      
      lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    477
                    2x
                    
                      
        variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    478
                    2x
                    
                      
        function(variable) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    479
                    2x
                    
                      
          .table_as_df(

                    		
                  

                  

                    480
                    2x
                    
                      
            data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    481
                    2x
                    
                      
            variable = variable,

                    		
                  

                  

                    482
                    2x
                    
                      
            by = by,

                    		
                  

                  

                    483
                    2x
                    
                      
            strata = strata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    484
                    2x
                    
                      
            count_column = "...ard_N...",

                    		
                  

                  

                    485
                    2x
                    
                      
            useNA = "always"

                    		
                  

                  

                    486

                    487
                    2x
                    
                      
            tidyr::drop_na(all_of(c(by, strata, variable))) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    488
                    2x
                    
                      
            dplyr::summarise(

                    		
                  

                  

                    489
                    2x
                    
                      
              .by = all_of(variable),

                    		
                  

                  

                    490
                    2x
                    
                      
              ...ard_N... = sum(.data$...ard_N...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    491
                    
                    
                      
            )

                    		
                  

                  

                    492
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    493
                    
                    
                      
      ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    494
                    2x
                    
                      
      stats::setNames(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    495
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    496
                    
                    
                      
  # if user passed a single integer

                    		
                  

                  

                    497
                    2x
                    
                      
  else if (is_scalar_integerish(denominator)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    498
                    1x
                    
                      
    lst_denominator <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    499
                    1x
                    
                      
      rep_named(

                    		
                  

                  

                    500
                    1x
                    
                      
        variables,

                    1x
                    
                      
        list(dplyr::tibble(...ard_N... = as.integer(denominator)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    502
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    503
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    504
                    
                    
                      
  # if user passed a data frame WITH the counts pre-specified

                    		
                  

                  

                    505
                    1x
                    
                      
  else if (is.data.frame(denominator) && "...ard_N..." %in% names(denominator)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    506
                    
                    
                      
    # check there are no duplicates in by/strata variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    507
                    
                    
                      
    if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    508
                    1x
                    
                      
      (any(c(by, strata) %in% names(denominator)) && any(duplicated(denominator[c(by, strata)]))) ||

                    		
                  

                  

                    509
                    1x
                    
                      
        (!any(c(by, strata) %in% names(denominator)) && nrow(denominator) > 1L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    510
                    
                    
                      
    ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    511
                    1x
                    
                      
      paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    512
                    1x
                    
                      
        "Specified counts in column {.val '...ard_N...'} are not unique in",

                    		
                  

                  

                    513
                    1x
                    
                      
        "the {.arg denominator} argument across the {.arg by} and {.arg strata} columns."

                    		
                  

                  

                    514
                    
                    
                      
      ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    515
                    1x
                    
                      
        cli::cli_abort(call = call)

                    		
                  

                  

                    516
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    517
                    !
                    
                      
    .check_for_missing_combos_in_denom(

                    		
                  

                  

                    518
                    !
                    
                      
      data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    519
                    !
                    
                      
      denominator = denominator, by = by, strata = strata, call = call

                    		
                  

                  

                    520
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    521
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    522
                    
                    
                      
    # making the by/strata columns character to merge them with the count data frames

                    		
                  

                  

                    523
                    !
                    
                      
    df_denom <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    524
                    !
                    
                      
      denominator |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    525
                    !
                    
                      
      dplyr::select(any_of(c(by, strata, "...ard_N..."))) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    526
                    !
                    
                      
      tidyr::drop_na() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    527
                    !
                    
                      
      dplyr::mutate(across(any_of(c(by, strata)), as.character))

                    		
                  

                  

                    528
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    529
                    !
                    
                      
    lst_denominator <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    530
                    !
                    
                      
      rep_named(variables, list(df_denom))

                    		
                  

                  

                    531
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    532
                    !
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort("The {.arg denominator} argument has been mis-specified.", call = call)

                    		
                  

                  

                    533

                    540
                    
                    
                      
#' Check for Missing Levels in `denominator`

                    		
                  

                  

                    541
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    542
                    
                    
                      
#' When a user passes a data frame in the `denominator` argument, this function

                    		
                  

                  

                    543
                    
                    
                      
#' checks that the data frame contains all the same levels of the `by`

                    		
                  

                  

                    544
                    
                    
                      
#' and `strata` variables that appear in `data`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    545
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    546
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    547
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    548
                    
                    
                      
#' @param denominator (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    549
                    
                    
                      
#'   denominator data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    550
                    
                    
                      
#' @param by (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    551
                    
                    
                      
#'   character vector of by column names

                    		
                  

                  

                    552
                    
                    
                      
#' @param strata (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    553
                    
                    
                      
#'   character vector of strata column names

                    		
                  

                  

                    554
                    
                    
                      
#' @param call (`environment`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    555
                    
                    
                      
#'   frame for error messaging. Default is [parent.frame()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    556
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    557
                    
                    
                      
#' @return returns invisible if check is successful, throws an error message if not.

                    		
                  

                  

                    558
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    559
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    560
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    561
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.check_for_missing_combos_in_denom(ADSL, denominator = "col", by = "ARM", strata = "AGEGR1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    562
                    
                    
                      
.check_for_missing_combos_in_denom <- function(data, denominator, by, strata, call = parent.frame()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    563
                    7x
                    
                      
  by_vars_to_check <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    564
                    7x
                    
                      
    c(by, strata) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    565
                    7x
                    
                      
    intersect(names(data)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    566
                    7x
                    
                      
    intersect(names(denominator))

                    		
                  

                  

                    567
                    7x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(by_vars_to_check)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    568
                    !
                    
                      
    return(invisible())

                    		
                  

                  

                    569
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    570
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    571
                    
                    
                      
  # find missing combinations

                    		
                  

                  

                    572
                    7x
                    
                      
  df_denom_level_check <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    573
                    7x
                    
                      
    dplyr::anti_join(

                    		
                  

                  

                    574
                    7x
                    
                      
      data[by_vars_to_check] |> unique(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    575
                    7x
                    
                      
      denominator[by_vars_to_check] |> unique(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    576
                    7x
                    
                      
      by_vars_to_check

                    		
                  

                  

                    577
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    578
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    579
                    
                    
                      
  # message users of missing combination

                    		
                  

                  

                    580
                    7x
                    
                      
  if (nrow(df_denom_level_check) > 0L) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    581
                    1x
                    
                      
    missing_combos <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    582
                    1x
                    
                      
      df_denom_level_check |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    583
                    1x
                    
                      
      unique() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    584
                    1x
                    
                      
      imap(~ glue::glue("{.y} ({.x})")) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    585
                    1x
                    
                      
      dplyr::bind_cols() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    586
                    1x
                    
                      
      as.matrix() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    587
                    1x
                    
                      
      apply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    588
                    1x
                    
                      
        MARGIN = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    589
                    1x
                    
                      
        FUN = function(x) paste(x, collapse = "/"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    590
                    1x
                    
                      
        simplify = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    591
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    592
                    1x
                    
                      
    paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    593
                    1x
                    
                      
      "The following {.arg by/strata} combinations are missing from the",

                    		
                  

                  

                    594
                    1x
                    
                      
      "{.arg denominator} data frame: {.val {missing_combos}}."

                    		
                  

                  

                    595
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    596
                    1x
                    
                      
      cli::cli_abort(call = call)

                    		
                  

                  

                    597
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    598
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' ARD Selectors

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' These selection helpers match variables according to a given pattern.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' - `all_ard_groups()`: Use this function in dplyr selecting environments, such

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   as [dplyr::select()]. Function selects grouping columns, e.g. columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   named `"group##"` or `"group##_level"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' - `all_ard_variables()`: Use this function in dplyr selecting environments, such

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   as `dplyr::select()`. Function selects variables columns, e.g. columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   named `"variable"` or `"variable_level"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param types (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   type(s) of columns to select. `"names"` selects the columns variable name columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   and `"levels"` selects the level columns. Default is `c("names", "levels")`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @return tidyselect output

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @name selectors

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' ard <- ard_categorical(ADSL, by = "ARM", variables = "AGEGR1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' ard |> dplyr::select(all_ard_groups())

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' ard |> dplyr::select(all_ard_variables())

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname selectors

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
all_ard_groups <- function(types = c("names", "levels")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    531x
                    
                      
  types <- arg_match(types, values = c("names", "levels"), multiple = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    531x
                    
                      
  if (setequal(types, c("names", "levels"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    483x
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::matches("^group[0-9]+$|^group[0-9]+_level$"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    48x
                    
                      
  if (setequal(types, "names")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    23x
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::matches("^group[0-9]+$$"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    25x
                    
                      
  if (setequal(types, "levels")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    25x
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::matches("^group[0-9]+_level$"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname selectors

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
all_ard_variables <- function(types = c("names", "levels")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    437x
                    
                      
  types <- arg_match(types, values = c("names", "levels"), multiple = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    437x
                    
                      
  if (setequal(types, c("names", "levels"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    411x
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::any_of(c("variable", "variable_level")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (setequal(types, "names")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    23x
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::any_of("variable"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    3x
                    
                      
  if (setequal(types, "levels")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    3x
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::any_of("variable_level"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Check Package Installation

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' - `check_pkg_installed()`: checks whether a package is installed and

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'   returns an error if not available, or interactively asks user to install

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'   missing dependency. If a package search is provided,

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   the function will check whether a minimum version of a package is required and installed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' - `is_pkg_installed()`: checks whether a package is installed and

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   returns `TRUE` or `FALSE` depending on availability. If a package search is provided,

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   the function will check whether a minimum version of a package is required and installed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' - `get_pkg_dependencies()` returns a tibble with all

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   dependencies of a specific package.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' - `get_min_version_required()` will return, if any, the minimum version

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   of `pkg` required by `reference_pkg`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @param pkg (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   vector of package names to check.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @param call (`environment`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   frame for error messaging. Default is [parent.frame()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @param reference_pkg (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   name of the package the function will search for a minimum required version from.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lib.loc (`path`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   location of `R` library trees to search through, see [utils::packageDescription()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @return `is_pkg_installed()` and `check_pkg_installed()` returns a logical or error,

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' `get_min_version_required()` returns a data frame with the minimum version required,

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' `get_pkg_dependencies()` returns a tibble.

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @name check_pkg_installed

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' check_pkg_installed("dplyr")

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' is_pkg_installed("dplyr")

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' get_pkg_dependencies()

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' get_min_version_required("dplyr")

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname check_pkg_installed

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
check_pkg_installed <- function(pkg,

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
                                reference_pkg = "cards",

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
                                call = parent.frame()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    3x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(pkg)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    3x
                    
                      
  check_class(pkg, cls = "character")

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    3x
                    
                      
  check_string(reference_pkg, allow_empty = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
  # get min version data -------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    3x
                    
                      
  df_pkg_min_version <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    3x
                    
                      
    get_min_version_required(pkg = pkg, reference_pkg = reference_pkg, call = call)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  # prompt user to install package ---------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    3x
                    
                      
  rlang::check_installed(

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    3x
                    
                      
    pkg = df_pkg_min_version$pkg,

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    3x
                    
                      
    version = df_pkg_min_version$version,

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    3x
                    
                      
    compare = df_pkg_min_version$compare,

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    3x
                    
                      
    call = call

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
    # this can be removed after this issue is resolved https://github.com/r-lib/rlang/issues/1694

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    3x
                    
                      
    suppressWarnings()

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname check_pkg_installed

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
is_pkg_installed <- function(pkg,

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
                             reference_pkg = "cards",

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
                             call = parent.frame()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    4x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(pkg)

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    4x
                    
                      
  check_class(pkg, cls = "character")

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    4x
                    
                      
  check_string(reference_pkg, allow_empty = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
  # get min version data -------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    4x
                    
                      
  df_pkg_min_version <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    4x
                    
                      
    get_min_version_required(pkg = pkg, reference_pkg = reference_pkg, call = call)

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
  # check installation TRUE/FALSE ----------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    4x
                    
                      
  rlang::is_installed(

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    4x
                    
                      
    pkg = df_pkg_min_version$pkg,

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    4x
                    
                      
    version = df_pkg_min_version$version,

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    4x
                    
                      
    compare = df_pkg_min_version$compare

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
  ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
    # this can be removed after this issue is resolved https://github.com/r-lib/rlang/issues/1694

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    4x
                    
                      
    suppressWarnings()

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname check_pkg_installed

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
get_pkg_dependencies <- function(reference_pkg = "cards", lib.loc = NULL, call = parent.frame()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    9x
                    
                      
  check_string(reference_pkg, allow_empty = TRUE, call = call)

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    9x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(reference_pkg)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    !
                    
                      
    return(.empty_pkg_deps_df())

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    9x
                    
                      
  description <- utils::packageDescription(reference_pkg, lib.loc = lib.loc) |> suppressWarnings()

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    9x
                    
                      
  if (identical(description, NA)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
    return(.empty_pkg_deps_df())

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    9x
                    
                      
  description |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    9x
                    
                      
    unclass() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    9x
                    
                      
    dplyr::as_tibble() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    9x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    9x
                    
                      
      any_of(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    9x
                    
                      
        "Package", "Version", "Imports", "Depends",

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    9x
                    
                      
        "Suggests", "Enhances", "LinkingTo"

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
      ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    9x
                    
                      
    dplyr::rename(

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    9x
                    
                      
      reference_pkg = "Package",

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    9x
                    
                      
      reference_pkg_version = "Version"

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    9x
                    
                      
    tidyr::pivot_longer(

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    9x
                    
                      
      -dplyr::all_of(c("reference_pkg", "reference_pkg_version")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    9x
                    
                      
      values_to = "pkg",

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    9x
                    
                      
      names_to = "dependency_type",

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    9x
                    
                      
    tidyr::separate_rows("pkg", sep = ",") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    9x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(pkg = str_squish(.data$pkg)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    9x
                    
                      
    dplyr::filter(!is.na(.data$pkg)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    9x
                    
                      
    tidyr::separate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    9x
                    
                      
      .data$pkg,

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    9x
                    
                      
      into = c("pkg", "version"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    9x
                    
                      
      sep = " ", extra = "merge", fill = "right"

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    9x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    9x
                    
                      
      compare = .data$version |> str_extract(pattern = "[>=<]+"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    9x
                    
                      
      version = .data$version |> str_remove_all(pattern = "[\\(\\) >=<]")

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
.empty_pkg_deps_df <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    2x
                    
                      
  dplyr::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    2x
                    
                      
    reference_pkg = character(0L), reference_pkg_version = character(0L),

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    2x
                    
                      
    dependency_type = character(0L), pkg = character(0L),

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    2x
                    
                      
    version = character(0L), compare = character(0L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname check_pkg_installed

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
get_min_version_required <- function(pkg, reference_pkg = "cards",

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
                                     lib.loc = NULL, call = parent.frame()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    10x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(pkg, call = call)

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    10x
                    
                      
  check_class(pkg, cls = "character", call = call)

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    10x
                    
                      
  check_string(reference_pkg, allow_empty = TRUE, call = call)

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
  # if no package reference, return a df with just the pkg names

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(reference_pkg)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    2x
                    
                      
    return(

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    2x
                    
                      
      .empty_pkg_deps_df() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    2x
                    
                      
        dplyr::full_join(

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    2x
                    
                      
          dplyr::tibble(pkg = pkg),

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    2x
                    
                      
          by = "pkg"

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
  # get the package_ref deps and subset on requested pkgs, also supplement df with pkgs

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
  # that may not be proper deps of the reference package (these pkgs don't have min versions)

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    8x
                    
                      
  res <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    8x
                    
                      
    get_pkg_dependencies(reference_pkg, lib.loc = lib.loc) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    8x
                    
                      
    dplyr::filter(.data$pkg %in% .env$pkg) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    8x
                    
                      
    dplyr::full_join(

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    8x
                    
                      
      dplyr::tibble(pkg = pkg),

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    8x
                    
                      
      by = "pkg"

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    8x
                    
                      
  res

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' ARD Nesting

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' This function is similar to [tidyr::nest()], except that it retains

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' rows for unobserved combinations (and unobserved factor levels) of by

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' variables, and unobserved combinations of stratifying variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' The levels are wrapped in lists so they can be stacked with other types

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' of different classes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param by,strata (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   columns to nest by/stratify by. Arguments are similar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   but with an important distinction:

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   `by`: data frame is nested by **all combinations** of the columns specified,

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   including unobserved combinations and unobserved factor levels.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   `strata`: data frame is nested by **all _observed_ combinations** of the

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   columns specified.

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   Arguments may be used in conjunction with one another.

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @param key (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   the name of the new column with the nested data frame. Default is `"data"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @param rename_columns (`logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   logical indicating whether to rename the `by` and `strata` variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `TRUE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @param list_columns (`logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'   logical indicating whether to put levels of `by` and

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'   `strata` columns in a list. Default is `TRUE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a nested tibble

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' nest_for_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'   data =

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'     ADAE |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'       dplyr::left_join(ADSL[c("USUBJID", "ARM")], by = "USUBJID") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'       dplyr::filter(AOCCSFL %in% "Y"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = "ARM",

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   strata = "AESOC"

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
