#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
nest_for_ard <- function(data, by = NULL, strata = NULL, key = "data",

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
                         rename_columns = TRUE, list_columns = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  # if no by/stratifying variables, simply return the data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    78x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(by) && is_empty(strata)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    25x
                    
                      
    return((dplyr::tibble("{key}" := list(data))))

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    53x
                    
                      
  n_missing <- nrow(data) - nrow(tidyr::drop_na(data, all_of(by), all_of(strata)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    53x
                    
                      
  if (n_missing > 0L) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    !
                    
                      
    cli::cli_inform("{n_missing} missing observation{?s} in the {.val {c(by, strata)}} column{?s} have been removed.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  # create nested strata data --------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    53x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(strata)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    2x
                    
                      
    df_strata <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    2x
                    
                      
      data[strata] |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    2x
                    
                      
      tidyr::drop_na() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    2x
                    
                      
      dplyr::distinct() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    2x
                    
                      
      dplyr::arrange(across(all_of(strata)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
  # create nested by data --------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    53x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(by)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
    # get a named list of all unique values for each by variable (including unobserved levels)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    52x
                    
                      
    lst_unique_vals <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    52x
                    
                      
      by |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    52x
                    
                      
      lapply(FUN = function(x) data[[x]] |> .unique_and_sorted()) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    52x
                    
                      
      stats::setNames(nm = by)

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
    # convert that list to a data frame with one row per unique combination

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    52x
                    
                      
    df_by <- tidyr::expand_grid(!!!lst_unique_vals)

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
  # combining by and strata data sets into one, as needed ----------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    53x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(by) && is_empty(strata)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    51x
                    
                      
    df_return <- df_by

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    2x
                    
                      
  } else if (is_empty(by) && !is_empty(strata)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    1x
                    
                      
    df_return <- df_strata

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1x
                    
                      
  } else if (!is_empty(by) && !is_empty(strata)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    1x
                    
                      
    df_return <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    1x
                    
                      
      df_strata |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    1x
                    
                      
      dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    1x
                    
                      
        "{key}" := list(df_by),

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    1x
                    
                      
        .before = 0L

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
      ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    1x
                    
                      
      tidyr::unnest(cols = all_of(key))

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  # we will now add a column to the df_return data frame of the subsetted data

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
  #   to do so, we'll construct a list of expressions that can be passed to

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
  #   dplyr::filter() to subset the data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    53x
                    
                      
  lst_filter_exprs <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    53x
                    
                      
    seq_len(nrow(df_return)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    53x
                    
                      
    lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    53x
                    
                      
      FUN = function(i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    155x
                    
                      
        lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    155x
                    
                      
          X = c(by, strata),

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    155x
                    
                      
          FUN = function(z) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    199x
                    
                      
            expr(!!data_sym(z) %in% df_return[[!!z]][!!i])

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
  # now adding the subsetted data frames to the nested tibble

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    53x
                    
                      
  df_return[[key]] <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    53x
                    
                      
    lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    53x
                    
                      
      seq_len(nrow(df_return)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    53x
                    
                      
      FUN = function(i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    155x
                    
                      
        dplyr::filter(data, !!!lst_filter_exprs[[i]]) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    155x
                    
                      
          dplyr::select(-all_of(.env$by), -all_of(.env$strata))

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
  # put variable levels in list to preserve types when stacked -----------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    53x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(list_columns)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    53x
                    
                      
    df_return <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    53x
                    
                      
      df_return |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    53x
                    
                      
      dplyr::mutate(across(.cols = -all_of(key), .fns = as.list))

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
  # rename by and strata columns to group## and group##_level ------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    53x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(rename_columns)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    53x
                    
                      
    df_return <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    53x
                    
                      
      df_return |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    53x
                    
                      
      .rename_ard_columns(by = by, strata = strata)

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
  # returning final nested tibble ----------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    53x
                    
                      
  df_return |> dplyr::as_tibble()

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#' Rename ARD Columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#' If `variable` is provided, adds the standard `variable` column to `x`. If `by`/`strata` are

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#' provided, adds the standard `group##` column(s) to `x` and renames the provided columns to

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#' `group##_level` in `x`, where `##` is determined by the column's position in `c(by, strata)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#' @param variable (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#'   name of `variable` column in `x`. Default is `NULL`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#' @param by (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#'   character vector of names of `by` columns in `x`. Default is `NULL`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#' @param strata (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#'   character vector of names of `strata` columns in `x`. Default is `NULL`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a tibble

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#' ard <- nest_for_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#'   data =

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#'     ADAE |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#'       dplyr::left_join(ADSL[c("USUBJID", "ARM")], by = "USUBJID") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#'       dplyr::filter(AOCCSFL %in% "Y"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = "ARM",

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#'   strata = "AESOC",

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
#'   rename_columns = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.rename_ard_columns(ard, by = "ARM", strata = "AESOC")

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
.rename_ard_columns <- function(x, variable = NULL, by = NULL, strata = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    152x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(variable)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    99x
                    
                      
    x <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    99x
                    
                      
      x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    99x
                    
                      
      dplyr::rename(variable_level = !!sym(variable)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    99x
                    
                      
      dplyr::mutate(variable = .env$variable, .before = 0L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    152x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(by) || !is_empty(strata)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    119x
                    
                      
    x <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    119x
                    
                      
      x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    119x
                    
                      
      dplyr::mutate(!!!(as.list(c(by, strata)) |> stats::setNames(paste0("group", seq_along(c(strata, by))))), .before = 0L) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    119x
                    
                      
      dplyr::rename(!!!(as.list(c(by, strata)) |> stats::setNames(paste0("group", seq_along(c(strata, by)), "_level"))))

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    152x
                    
                      
  tidy_ard_column_order(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Continuous ARD Statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Compute Analysis Results Data (ARD) for simple continuous summary statistics.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param variables ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   columns to include in summaries. Default is `everything()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param by,strata ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   columns to tabulate by/stratify by for summary statistic

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   calculation. Arguments are similar, but with an important distinction:

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   `by`: results are calculated for **all combinations** of the columns specified,

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'      including unobserved combinations and unobserved factor levels.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   `strata`: results are calculated for **all _observed_ combinations** of the

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'     columns specified.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   Arguments may be used in conjunction with one another.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @param statistic ([`formula-list-selector`][syntax])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   a named list, a list of formulas,

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   or a single formula where the list element is a named list of functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   (or the RHS of a formula),

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   e.g. `list(mpg = list(mean = \(x) mean(x)))`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   The value assigned to each variable must also be a named list, where the names

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   are used to reference a function and the element is the function object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   Typically, this function will return a scalar statistic, but a function that

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'   returns a named list of results is also acceptable, e.g.

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'   `list(conf.low = -1, conf.high = 1)`. However, when errors occur, the messaging

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'   will be less clear in this setting.

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fmt_fn ([`formula-list-selector`][syntax])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'   a named list, a list of formulas,

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'   or a single formula where the list element is a named list of functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'   (or the RHS of a formula),

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'   e.g. `list(mpg = list(mean = \(x) round(x, digits = 2) |> as.character()))`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @param stat_label ([`formula-list-selector`][syntax])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'   a named list, a list of formulas, or a single formula where

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'   the list element is either a named list or a list of formulas defining the

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'   statistic labels, e.g. `everything() ~ list(mean = "Mean", sd = "SD")` or

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'   `everything() ~ list(mean ~ "Mean", sd ~ "SD")`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(ADSL, by = "ARM", variables = "AGE")

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' # if a single function returns a named list, the named

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' # results will be placed in the resulting ARD

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' ADSL |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'   dplyr::group_by(ARM) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_continuous(

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'     variables = "AGE",

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'     statistic =

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#'       ~ list(conf.int = \(x) t.test(x)[["conf.int"]] |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'         as.list() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'         setNames(c("conf.low", "conf.high")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
ard_continuous <- function(data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
                           variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
                           by = dplyr::group_vars(data),

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
                           strata = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
                           statistic = everything() ~ continuous_summary_fns(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
                           fmt_fn = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
                           stat_label = everything() ~ default_stat_labels()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    76x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    76x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    76x
                    
                      
  check_data_frame(x = data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    76x
                    
                      
  .check_no_ard_columns(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
  # process arguments ----------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    76x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    76x
                    
                      
    variables = {{ variables }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    76x
                    
                      
    by = {{ by }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    76x
                    
                      
    strata = {{ strata }}

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    76x
                    
                      
  data <- dplyr::ungroup(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    76x
                    
                      
  process_formula_selectors(

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    76x
                    
                      
    data = data[variables],

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    76x
                    
                      
    statistic = statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    76x
                    
                      
    fmt_fn = fmt_fn,

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    76x
                    
                      
    stat_label = stat_label

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    76x
                    
                      
  fill_formula_selectors(

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    76x
                    
                      
    data = data[variables],

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    76x
                    
                      
    statistic = formals(cards::ard_continuous)[["statistic"]] |> eval(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    76x
                    
                      
    stat_label = formals(cards::ard_continuous)[["stat_label"]] |> eval()

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    76x
                    
                      
  check_list_elements(

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    76x
                    
                      
    x = statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    76x
                    
                      
    predicate = function(x) is.list(x) && is_named(x) && every(x, is.function),

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    76x
                    
                      
    error_msg =

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    76x
                    
                      
      c("Error in the argument {.arg {arg_name}} for variable {.val {variable}}.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    76x
                    
                      
        "i" = "Value must be a named list of functions."

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
  # return empty tibble if no variables selected -------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    75x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(variables)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::tibble())

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
  # calculate statistics -------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    75x
                    
                      
  df_nested <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    75x
                    
                      
    data |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    75x
                    
                      
    nest_for_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    75x
                    
                      
      by = by,

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    75x
                    
                      
      strata = strata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    75x
                    
                      
      key = "...ard_nested_data..."

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
  # calculate statistics indicated by user in statistics argument

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    75x
                    
                      
  df_nested <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    75x
                    
                      
    .calculate_stats_as_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    75x
                    
                      
      df_nested = df_nested,

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    75x
                    
                      
      variables = variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    75x
                    
                      
      statistic = statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    75x
                    
                      
      new_col_name = "...ard_all_stats...",

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    75x
                    
                      
      by = by,

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    75x
                    
                      
      strata = strata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    75x
                    
                      
      data = data

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
  # unnest results

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    75x
                    
                      
  df_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    75x
                    
                      
    df_nested |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    75x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(all_ard_groups(), "...ard_all_stats...") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    75x
                    
                      
    tidyr::unnest(cols = "...ard_all_stats...")

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
  # final processing of fmt_fn -------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    75x
                    
                      
  df_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    75x
                    
                      
    .process_nested_list_as_df(

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    75x
                    
                      
      x = df_results,

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    75x
                    
                      
      arg = fmt_fn,

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    75x
                    
                      
      new_column = "fmt_fn"

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    75x
                    
                      
    .default_fmt_fn()

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
  # final processing of stat labels --------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    75x
                    
                      
  df_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    75x
                    
                      
    .process_nested_list_as_df(

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    75x
                    
                      
      x = df_results,

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    75x
                    
                      
      arg = stat_label,

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    75x
                    
                      
      new_column = "stat_label",

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    75x
                    
                      
      unlist = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    75x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(stat_label = dplyr::coalesce(.data$stat_label, .data$stat_name))

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
  # add meta data and class ----------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    75x
                    
                      
  df_results |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    75x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(context = "continuous") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    75x
                    
                      
    tidy_ard_column_order() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    75x
                    
                      
    {structure(., class = c("card", class(.)))} # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#' Check Protected Column Names

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
#' Checks that column names in a passed data frame are not protected, that is,

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
#' they do not begin with `"...ard_"` and end with `"..."`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
#' @param call (`environment`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
#'   frame for error messaging. Default is [parent.frame()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
#' @param exceptions (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
#'   character string of column names to exclude from checks

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
#' @return returns invisible if check is successful, throws an error message if not.

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- data.frame("ard_x" = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.check_no_ard_columns(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
.check_no_ard_columns <- function(x, call = parent.frame(), exceptions = "...ard_dummy_for_counting...") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    171x
                    
                      
  colnames <- names(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    171x
                    
                      
  ard_colnames <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    171x
                    
                      
    colnames[startsWith(colnames, "...ard_") & endsWith(colnames, "...")] |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    171x
                    
                      
    setdiff(exceptions)

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    171x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(ard_colnames)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    !
                    
                      
    "Columns beginning with {.val '...ard_'} and ending with {.val '...'} are not allowed." |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    !
                    
                      
      cli::cli_abort(call = call)

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculate Continuous Statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculate statistics and return in an ARD format

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
#' @param df_nested (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
#'   a nested data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
#' @param variables (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
#'   character vector of variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
#' @param statistic (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
#'   named list of statistical functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
#' data_nested <- ADSL |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
#'   nest_for_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
#'     by = "ARM",

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
#'     strata = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
#'     key = "...ard_nested_data..."

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.calculate_stats_as_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
#'   df_nested = data_nested,

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = "AGE",

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
#'   statistic = list(mean = "mean"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = "ARM",

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
#'   strata = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
#'   data = ADSL

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
.calculate_stats_as_ard <- function(df_nested, variables, statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
                                    by, strata, data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
                                    new_col_name = "...ard_all_stats...") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    75x
                    
                      
  df_nested[[new_col_name]] <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    75x
                    
                      
    map(

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    75x
                    
                      
      df_nested[["...ard_nested_data..."]],

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    75x
                    
                      
      function(nested_data) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    155x
                    
                      
        map(

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    155x
                    
                      
          variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    155x
                    
                      
          function(variable) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    196x
                    
                      
            map2(

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    196x
                    
                      
              statistic[[variable]], names(statistic[[variable]]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    196x
                    
                      
              function(fun, fun_name) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    1132x
                    
                      
                .lst_results_as_df(

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    1132x
                    
                      
                  x = # calculate results, and place in tibble

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    1132x
                    
                      
                    eval_capture_conditions(

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    1132x
                    
                      
                      getOption(

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    1132x
                    
                      
                        "cards.calculate_stats_as_ard.eval_fun",

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    1132x
                    
                      
                        default = expr(do.call(fun, args = list(stats::na.omit(nested_data[[variable]]))))

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
                      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    
                    
                      
                    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    1132x
                    
                      
                  variable = variable,

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    1132x
                    
                      
                  fun_name = fun_name

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    
                    
                      
                )

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    
                    
                      
              }

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    
                    
                      
            ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    196x
                    
                      
              unname()

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    
                    
                      
        ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    155x
                    
                      
          dplyr::bind_rows()

      }
