                    276
                    
                    
                      
                         arg_name = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    
                    
                      
                         .call = parent.frame()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    925x
                    
                      
  tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    925x
                    
                      
    tidyselect::eval_select(expr = expr, data = data, ...) |> names(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    925x
                    
                      
    error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    1x
                    
                      
      cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    1x
                    
                      
        message =

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    1x
                    
                      
          c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    1x
                    
                      
            "!" = switch(!is.null(arg_name),

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    1x
                    
                      
              "Error processing {.arg {arg_name}} argument."

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    
                    
                      
            ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    1x
                    
                      
            "!" = cli::ansi_strip(conditionMessage(e)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    1x
                    
                      
            i = "Select among columns {.val {names(data)}}"

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    
                    
                      
          ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    1x
                    
                      
        call = .call

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Summary Functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' - `continuous_summary_fns()` returns a named list of summary functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'   for continuous variables. Some functions include slight modifications to

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'   their base equivalents. For example, the `min()` and `max()` functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   return `NA` instead of `Inf` when an empty vector is passed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   Statistics `"p25"` and `"p75"` are calculated with `quantile(type = 2)`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   which matches

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   [SAS's default value](https://psiaims.github.io/CAMIS/Comp/r-sas-summary-stats.html).

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' - `categorical_summary_fns()` returns a named list of summary statistics for

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   categorical variables. Options are `"n"`, `"N"`, and `"p"`. If a user requests, for

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   example, only `"p"`, the function will return `"n"` and `"N"` as well, since they are

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   needed to calculate `"p"`. These statistics will be stored as a vector within the

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   `tabulation` list element.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' - `missing_summary_fns()` returns a named list of summary functions suitable

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   for variable-level summaries, such as number and rate of missing data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @param summaries (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   a character vector of results to include in output.

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `continuous_summary_fns()`: Select one or more from

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'     `r eval(formals(continuous_summary_fns)$summaries) %>% {paste(shQuote(., "sh"), collapse = ", ")}`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `categorical_summary_fns()`: Select one or more from

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'     `r eval(formals(categorical_summary_fns)$summaries) %>% {paste(shQuote(., "sh"), collapse = ", ")}`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `missing_summary_fns()`: Select one or more from

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'     `r eval(formals(missing_summary_fns)$summaries) %>% {paste(shQuote(., "sh"), collapse = ", ")}`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @param other_stats (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'   named list of other statistic functions to supplement the pre-programmed functions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @return `continuous_summary_fns()` and `missing_summary_fns()` return a named list of summary

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' functions, `categorical_summary_fns()` returns a named list of summary statistics.

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @name summary_functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' # continuous variable summaries

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'   ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = "AGE",

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'   statistic = ~ continuous_summary_fns(c("N", "median"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' # categorical variable summaries

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_categorical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'   ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = "AGEGR1",

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'   statistic = ~ categorical_summary_fns(c("n", "N"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' # summary for rates of missing data

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_missing(

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#'   ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = c("AGE", "AGEGR1"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'   statistic = ~ missing_summary_fns()

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname summary_functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
continuous_summary_fns <- function(summaries = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
                                     "N", "mean", "sd", "median",

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
                                     "p25", "p75", "min", "max"

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
                                   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
                                   other_stats = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
  # process the selection of the summary stats to include ----------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    61x
                    
                      
  summaries <- arg_match(summaries, multiple = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
  # list all functions available by default ------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    61x
                    
                      
  list_fns <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    61x
                    
                      
    list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    61x
                    
                      
      N = function(x) length(x),

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    61x
                    
                      
      mean = function(x) mean(x, na.rm = TRUE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    61x
                    
                      
      sd = function(x) stats::sd(x, na.rm = TRUE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    61x
                    
                      
      median = function(x) stats::median(x, na.rm = TRUE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    61x
                    
                      
      p25 = function(x) stats::quantile(x, probs = 0.25, na.rm = TRUE, type = 2) |> unname(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    61x
                    
                      
      p75 = function(x) stats::quantile(x, probs = 0.75, na.rm = TRUE, type = 2) |> unname(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    61x
                    
                      
      min = function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    137x
                    
                      
        if (length(x) == 0L) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1x
                    
                      
          return(structure(NA, class = class(x)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    136x
                    
                      
        min(x, na.rm = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
      },

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    61x
                    
                      
      max = function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    136x
                    
                      
        if (length(x) == 0L) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
          return(structure(NA, class = class(x)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    136x
                    
                      
        max(x, na.rm = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
  # return list of functions ---------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    61x
                    
                      
  list_fns[summaries] |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    61x
                    
                      
    c(other_stats)

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname summary_functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
categorical_summary_fns <- function(summaries = c("n", "p", "N"), other_stats = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    94x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(summaries)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    94x
                    
                      
    summaries <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    94x
                    
                      
      arg_match(summaries, values = c("n", "p", "N"), multiple = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    94x
                    
                      
  check_class(x = other_stats, cls = "list", allow_empty = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
  # combine tabulation and other stats -----------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    94x
                    
                      
  lst_all_stats <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    94x
                    
                      
    list(tabulation = summaries) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    94x
                    
                      
    c(other_stats)

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    94x
                    
                      
  lst_all_stats

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname summary_functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
missing_summary_fns <- function(summaries = c("N_obs", "N_miss", "N_nonmiss", "p_miss", "p_nonmiss")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    6x
                    
                      
  summaries <- arg_match(summaries, multiple = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    6x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    6x
                    
                      
    var_level =

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    6x
                    
                      
      function(x, stats = summaries) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    21x
                    
                      
        res <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    21x
                    
                      
        if (any(c("N_obs", "N_nonmiss", "p_miss", "p_nonmiss") %in% stats)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    21x
                    
                      
          res[["N_obs"]] <- length(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    21x
                    
                      
        if (any(c("N_miss", "N_nonmiss", "p_miss") %in% stats)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    21x
                    
                      
          res[["N_miss"]] <- sum(!x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    21x
                    
                      
        if (any(c("N_nonmiss", "p_nonmiss") %in% stats)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    21x
                    
                      
          res[["N_nonmiss"]] <- res[["N_obs"]] - res[["N_miss"]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    21x
                    
                      
        if ("p_miss" %in% stats) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    21x
                    
                      
          res[["p_miss"]] <- res[["N_miss"]] / res[["N_obs"]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    21x
                    
                      
        if ("p_nonmiss" %in% stats) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    21x
                    
                      
          res[["p_nonmiss"]] <- res[["N_nonmiss"]] / res[["N_obs"]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    21x
                    
                      
        res

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Stack ARDs

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Stack multiple ARD calls sharing common input `data` and `by` variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' Optionally incorporate additional information on represented variables, e.g.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' overall calculations, rates of missingness, attributes, or transform results

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' with `shuffle_ard()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' If the `ard_stack(by)` argument is specified, a univariate tabulation of the

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' by variable will also be returned.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param by ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   columns to tabulate by in the series of ARD function calls

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... ([`dynamic-dots`][dyn-dots])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   Series of ARD function calls to be run and stacked

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .overall (`logical`)\cr logical indicating whether overall statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   should be calculated (i.e. re-run all `ard_*()` calls with `by=NULL`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `FALSE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .missing (`logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   logical indicating whether to include the results of `ard_missing()` for all

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables represented in the ARD. Default is `FALSE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .attributes (`logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   logical indicating whether to include the results of `ard_attributes()` for all

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables represented in the ARD. Default is `FALSE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .shuffle (`logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   logical indicating whether to perform `shuffle_ard()` on the final result.

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `FALSE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @return  a transformed ARD data frame (of class 'card' if `.shuffle = FALSE`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_stack(

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'   data = ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = "ARM",

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_categorical(variables = "AGEGR1"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_continuous(variables = "AGE")

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_stack(

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   data = ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = "ARM",

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_categorical(variables = "AGEGR1"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_continuous(variables = "AGE"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'   .shuffle = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
ard_stack <- function(data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
                      by = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
                      ...,

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
                      .overall = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
                      .missing = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
                      .attributes = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
                      .shuffle = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  # process arguments ----------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    8x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    8x
                    
                      
    data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    8x
                    
                      
    by = {{ by }}

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    8x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    8x
                    
                      
  check_data_frame(x = data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    8x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(.overall)

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    8x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(.missing)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    8x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(.attributes)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    8x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(.shuffle)

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
  # evaluate the dots using common `data` and `by`

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    8x
                    
                      
  ard_list <- .eval_ard_calls(data, by, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
  # add overall

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(.overall)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    1x
                    
                      
    ard_list <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    1x
                    
                      
      ard_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    1x
                    
                      
      .eval_ard_calls(data, by = character(0), ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
  # compute Ns by group / combine main calls

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(by)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    6x
                    
                      
    ard_full <- bind_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    6x
                    
                      
      ard_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    6x
                    
                      
      ard_categorical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    6x
                    
                      
        data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    6x
                    
                      
        variables = all_of(by)

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    2x
                    
                      
    ard_full <- bind_ard(ard_list, .update = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
  # get all variables represented

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    8x
                    
                      
  variables <- unique(ard_full$variable)

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
  # missingness

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(.missing)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    1x
                    
                      
    ard_full <- bind_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    1x
                    
                      
      ard_full,

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    1x
                    
                      
      ard_missing(data = data, variables = all_of(variables))

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
  # attributes

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(.attributes)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    1x
                    
                      
    ard_full <- bind_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    1x
                    
                      
      ard_full,

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    1x
                    
                      
      ard_attributes(data = data, variables = all_of(variables))

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
  # order

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    8x
                    
                      
  ard_full <- tidy_ard_row_order(ard_full)

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
  # shuffle

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(.shuffle)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(shuffle_ard(ard_full))

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    7x
                    
                      
  ard_full

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' Evaluate the `ard_*()` function calls

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#' @param by ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#'   columns to tabulate by in the series of ARD function calls

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... ([`dynamic-dots`][dyn-dots])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#'   Series of ARD function calls to be run and stacked

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#' @return list of ARD data frames of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.eval_ard_calls(

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#'   data = ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = "ARM",

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_categorical(variables = "AGEGR1"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_continuous(variables = "AGE")

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
.eval_ard_calls <- function(data, by, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
  # capture quosures -----------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    9x
                    
                      
  dots <- enquos(...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
  # run the ARD calls -------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    9x
                    
                      
  lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    9x
                    
                      
    dots,

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    9x
                    
                      
    function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    18x
                    
                      
      x_rhs <- f_rhs(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    18x
                    
                      
      x_fn <- call_name(x_rhs)

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    18x
                    
                      
      x_args <- call_args(x_rhs)

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    18x
                    
                      
      do.call(x_fn, c(list(data = data, by = by), x_args), envir = attr(x, ".Environment"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Check ARD Structure

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Function tests the structure and returns notes when object does not

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' conform to expected structure.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card' (invisible)

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(ADSL, variables = "AGE") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   dplyr::select(-warning, -error) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   check_ard_structure()

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
check_ard_structure <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
  # check class ----------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!inherits(x, "card")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_inform("Object is not of class {.cls card}.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
  # exit if not a data frame ---------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!inherits(x, "data.frame")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    !
                    
                      
    return(invisible())

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  # check expected variables are present ---------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    1x
                    
                      
  missing_variables <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    1x
                    
                      
    c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    1x
                    
                      
      "variable", "stat_name", "stat_label", "stat",

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    1x
                    
                      
      "fmt_fn", "warning", "error"

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    1x
                    
                      
    setdiff(names(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(missing_variables)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_inform("The following columns are not present: {.val {missing_variables}}.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
  # check columns are list columns as expected ---------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    1x
                    
                      
  expected_lst_columns <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    1x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    1x
                    
                      
      x, all_ard_groups(), all_ard_variables(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    1x
                    
                      
      any_of(c("stat", "fmt_fn", "warning", "error"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
    # remove group## and variable columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    1x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(-matches("^group[0-9]$"), -"variable") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    1x
                    
                      
    names()

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    1x
                    
                      
  not_a_lst_columns <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    1x
                    
                      
    x[expected_lst_columns] |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    1x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(-where(is.list)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    1x
                    
                      
    names()

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(not_a_lst_columns)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_inform("The following columns are expected to be list columns: {.val {not_a_lst_columns}}.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    1x
                    
                      
  invisible(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Build ARD from Tidier

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Function converts a model's one-row tidy data frame into an ARD structure.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' The tidied data frame must have been constructed with

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' [eval_capture_conditions()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' This function is primarily for developers and few consistency checks have

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' been included.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lst_tidy (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   list of tidied results constructed with [eval_capture_conditions()],

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   e.g. `eval_capture_conditions(t.test(mtcars$mpg ~ mtcars$am) |> broom::tidy())`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tidy_result_names (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   character vector of column names expected by the

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   tidier method. This is used to construct blank results in the event of an error.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fun_args_to_record (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   character vector of function argument names that are added to the ARD.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @param formals (`pairlist`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   the results from `formals()`, e.g. `formals(fisher.test)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   This is used to get the default argument values from unspecified arguments.

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @param passed_args (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   named list of additional arguments passed to the modeling function.

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lst_ard_columns (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   named list of values that will be added to the ARD data frame.

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' # example how one may create a fisher.test() ARD function

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' my_ard_fishertest <- function(data, by, variable, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'   # perform fisher test and format results -----------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'   lst_tidy_fisher <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'     eval_capture_conditions(

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'       # this manipulation is similar to `fisher.test(...) |> broom::tidy()`

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'       stats::fisher.test(x = data[[variable]], y = data[[by]], ...)[c("p.value", "method")] |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'         as.data.frame()

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'     )

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'   # build ARD ------------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'   tidy_as_ard(

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'     lst_tidy = lst_tidy_fisher,

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
