#'     tidy_result_names = c("p.value", "method"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'     fun_args_to_record =

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'       c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'         "workspace", "hybrid", "hybridPars", "control", "or",

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'         "conf.int", "conf.level", "simulate.p.value", "B"

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'       ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'     formals = formals(stats::fisher.test),

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'     passed_args = dots_list(...),

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'     lst_ard_columns = list(group1 = by, variable = variable, context = "fishertest")

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' my_ard_fishertest(mtcars, by = "am", variable = "vs")

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
tidy_as_ard <- function(lst_tidy,

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
                        tidy_result_names,

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
                        fun_args_to_record = character(0L),

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
                        formals = list(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
                        passed_args = list(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
                        lst_ard_columns) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  # used argument values -------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
  lst_used_fun_args <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    1x
                    
                      
    tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    1x
                    
                      
      utils::modifyList(

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    1x
                    
                      
        x =

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
        # missing() is TRUE if the arg is not specified,

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
        # not actually missing (ie it can still have its default value)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    1x
                    
                      
          if (missing(formals)) formals else formals[fun_args_to_record],

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    1x
                    
                      
        val = passed_args,

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    1x
                    
                      
        keep.null = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    1x
                    
                      
      error = function(e) list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
  # if there are results, put them in the ARD format ---------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(lst_tidy[["result"]])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
    # combine results and function argument

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    1x
                    
                      
    lst_all_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    1x
                    
                      
      c(unclass(lst_tidy[["result"]]), lst_used_fun_args)

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
  # if there was an error calculating results, tidy up what we can -------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
  else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
    # combine empty results and function arguments

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
    lst_all_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
      utils::modifyList(

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    !
                    
                      
        x =

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
          rep_len(

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
            x = list(NULL),

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
            length.out = length(c(tidy_result_names, fun_args_to_record))

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
          ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    !
                    
                      
            stats::setNames(nm = c(tidy_result_names, fun_args_to_record)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
        val = lst_used_fun_args,

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
        keep.null = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
  # add results to tibble ------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    1x
                    
                      
  dplyr::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    1x
                    
                      
    stat_name = names(lst_all_results),

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    1x
                    
                      
    stat = lst_all_results,

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    1x
                    
                      
    fmt_fn = lapply(.data$stat, function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    12x
                    
                      
      switch(is.numeric(x),

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    6x
                    
                      
        1L

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
    }),

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    1x
                    
                      
    warning = lst_tidy["warning"],

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    1x
                    
                      
    error = lst_tidy["error"],

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    1x
                    
                      
    !!!lst_ard_columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
  ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    1x
                    
                      
    tidy_ard_column_order() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    1x
                    
                      
    {structure(., class = c("card", class(.)))} # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' ARD as Nested List

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' `r lifecycle::badge('experimental')`\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Convert ARDs to nested lists.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a nested list

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(mtcars, by = "cyl", variables = c("mpg", "hp")) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   as_nested_list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
as_nested_list <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
  # check in inputs ------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!inherits(x, "card")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    !
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort("Argument {.code x} must be class {.cls card}.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
  # format/round the statistics, if not already done ---------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!"stat_fmt" %in% names(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    1x
                    
                      
    x <- apply_fmt_fn(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
  # construct the nested lists to convert to JSON ------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    1x
                    
                      
  lst_pre_json <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    1x
                    
                      
    seq_len(nrow(x)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    1x
                    
                      
    lapply(FUN = function(i) .one_row_ard_to_nested_list(x[i, ]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  # construct nested list that will be converted to JSON -----------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    1x
                    
                      
  lst_return <- list() # initialize empty list that will be populated with results

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    1x
                    
                      
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(x))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    24x
                    
                      
    eval(lst_pre_json[[i]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
  # return nested list result --------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    1x
                    
                      
  lst_return

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' Convert One Row to Nested List

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card' with one row

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an expression that represents an element of a nested list

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(mtcars, variables = mpg) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'   dplyr::filter(dplyr::row_number() %in% 1L) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'   apply_fmt_fn() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'   cards:::.one_row_ard_to_nested_list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
.one_row_ard_to_nested_list <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    24x
                    
                      
  df_preparation <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    24x
                    
                      
    x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
    # variable levels are originally stored in lists. unlisting here and saving in tibble as a scalar

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    24x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    24x
                    
                      
      across(

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
        # TODO: Does the statistic column need to remain in a list for more complex returns?

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    24x
                    
                      
        .cols = where(is.list) & (dplyr::matches("^group[0-9]+_level$") | any_of("variable_level")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    24x
                    
                      
        .fns = function(x) x[[1]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
    ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
    # reorder with primary variable first, followed by stratum

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    24x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(., all_of(colnames(.) |> sort())) %>% # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    24x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    24x
                    
                      
      any_of(c("variable", "variable_level")), starts_with("group"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    24x
                    
                      
      "stat_name", "stat", "stat_fmt", "warning", "error", "context" # TODO: we could apply a formatting function and add that here

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
    # drop columns that are NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    24x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(-(where(function(x) all(is.na(x))) & (starts_with("group") | any_of("variable_level"))))

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
  # create a character string of the code, that we later convert to an expression

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  # TODO: converting strings to expressions feels hacky...is there a better way?

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    24x
                    
                      
  chr_nested_list_specification <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    24x
                    
                      
    df_preparation |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    24x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(any_of(c("variable", "variable_level")), starts_with("group"), "stat_name") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    24x
                    
                      
    as.list() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    24x
                    
                      
    imap(function(x, y) glue::glue("[[{shQuote(y)}]][[{shQuote(x)}]]")) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    24x
                    
                      
    unlist() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    24x
                    
                      
    paste(collapse = "") %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
    # 'lst_return' is the name of the nested list that will be converted to JSON

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    24x
                    
                      
    {paste0("lst_return", .)} # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
  # creating final expression defining the results within the nested list

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    24x
                    
                      
  expr(

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    24x
                    
                      
    !!parse_expr(chr_nested_list_specification) <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    24x
                    
                      
      !!dplyr::select(

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    24x
                    
                      
        df_preparation,

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    24x
                    
                      
        any_of(c("stat", "stat_fmt", "warning", "error", "context"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
      ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
        # this essentially flattens the nested list one level, while maintaining the names

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    24x
                    
                      
        imap(function(x, y) x[[1]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Apply Formatting Functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Apply the formatting functions to each of the raw statistics.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Function aliases are converted to functions using [alias_as_fmt_fn()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_continuous(ADSL, variables = "AGE") |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   apply_fmt_fn()

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
apply_fmt_fn <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (!inherits(x, "card")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort(c("i" = "Argument {.code x} must be class {.cls card}."))

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    9x
                    
                      
  x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    9x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    9x
                    
                      
      .after = "stat",

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    9x
                    
                      
      stat_fmt =

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    9x
                    
                      
        map2(

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    9x
                    
                      
          .data$stat,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    9x
                    
                      
          .data$fmt_fn,

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    9x
                    
                      
          function(x, fn) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    65x
                    
                      
            if (!is.null(fn)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    64x
                    
                      
              do.call(alias_as_fmt_fn(fn), args = list(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
            } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    1x
                    
                      
              NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' Convert Alias to Function

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' Accepted aliases are non-negative integers and strings.

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' The integers are converted to functions that round the statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' to the number of decimal places to match the integer.

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' The formatting strings come in the form `"xx"`, `"xx.x"`, `"xx.x%"`, etc.

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' The number of `x`s that appear after the decimal place indicate the number of

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' decimal places the statistics will be rounded to.

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' The number of `x`s that appear before the decimal place indicate the leading

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' spaces that are added to the result.

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' If the string ends in `"%"`, results are scaled by 100 before rounding.

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`integer`, `string`, or `function`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#'   a non-negative integer, string alias, or function

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' @param call (`environment`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'   frame for error messaging. Default is [parent.frame()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a function

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' alias_as_fmt_fn(1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' alias_as_fmt_fn("xx.x")

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
alias_as_fmt_fn <- function(x, call = parent.frame()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    64x
                    
                      
  if (is.function(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    6x
                    
                      
    return(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    58x
                    
                      
  if (is_integerish(x) && x >= 0L) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    50x
                    
                      
    return(label_cards(digits = as.integer(x)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (is_string(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    8x
                    
                      
    .check_fmt_string(x, call = call)

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
    # scale by 100 if it's a percentage

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    8x
                    
                      
    scale <- ifelse(endsWith(x, "%"), 100, 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    8x
                    
                      
    decimal_n <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    8x
                    
                      
      ifelse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    8x
                    
                      
        !grepl("\\.", x),

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    8x
                    
                      
        0L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    8x
                    
                      
        gsub("%", "", x) |> # remove percent sign if it is there

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    8x
                    
                      
          strsplit("xx.xx", split = ".", fixed = TRUE) |> # split string at decimal place

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    8x
                    
                      
          unlist() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    8x
                    
                      
          `[`(2) %>% # get the string after the period

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    4x
                    
                      
          {ifelse(is.na(.), 0L, nchar(.))} # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    8x
                    
                      
    width <- nchar(x) - endsWith(x, "%")

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    8x
                    
                      
    return(label_cards(digits = decimal_n, scale = scale, width = width))

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
  cli::cli_abort("Formatting functions/aliases must be a function, a non-negative integer, or a formatting string, e.g. {.val xx.x}.", call = call)

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#' Generate Formatting Function

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' Returns a function with the requested rounding and scaling schema.

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' @param digits (`integer`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#'   a non-negative integer specifying the number of decimal places

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#'   round statistics to

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#' @param scale (`numeric`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#'   a scalar real number. Before rounding, the input will be scaled by

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#'   this quantity

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' @param width (`integer`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#'   a non-negative integer specifying the minimum width of the

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#'   returned formatted values

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a function

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#' label_cards(2)(pi)

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' label_cards(1, scale = 100)(pi)

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' label_cards(2, width = 5)(pi)

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
label_cards <- function(digits = 1, scale = 1, width = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    5193x
                    
                      
  function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
    # round and scale vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    62x
                    
                      
    res <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    62x
                    
                      
      ifelse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    62x
                    
                      
        is.na(x),

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    62x
                    
                      
        NA_character_,

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    62x
                    
                      
        format(round5(x * scale, digits = digits), nsmall = digits) |> str_trim()

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
    # if width provided, pad formatted result

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    62x
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(width)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    10x
                    
                      
      res <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    10x
                    
                      
        ifelse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    10x
                    
                      
          nchar(res) >= width | is.na(res),

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    10x
                    
                      
          res,

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    10x
                    
                      
          paste0(strrep(" ", width - nchar(res)), res)

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
    # return final formatted vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    62x
                    
                      
    res

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#' Check 'xx' Format Structure

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#' A function that checks a **single** string for consistency.

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#' String must begin with 'x' and only consist of x's, a single period or none,

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#' and may end with a percent symbol.

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' If string is consistent, `TRUE` is returned. Otherwise an error.

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#'   string to check

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#' @param call (`environment`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#'   frame for error messaging. Default is [caller_env()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a logical

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.check_fmt_string("xx.x") # TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.check_fmt_string("xx.x%") # TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
.check_fmt_string <- function(x, call = caller_env()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
  # perform checks on the string

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    8x
                    
                      
  fmt_is_good <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    8x
                    
                      
    grepl("^x[x.%]+$", x = x) && # string begins with 'x', and consists of only x, period, or percent

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    8x
                    
                      
      sum(unlist(gregexpr("\\.", x)) != -1) %in% c(0L, 1L) && # a period appears 0 or 1 times

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    8x
                    
                      
      sum(unlist(gregexpr("%", x)) != -1) %in% c(0L, 1L) && # a percent appears 0 or 1 times

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    8x
                    
                      
      (sum(unlist(gregexpr("%", x)) != -1) %in% 0L || grepl(pattern = "%$", x = x)) # if there is a % it appears at the end

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (isFALSE(fmt_is_good)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    !
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort("The format {.val {x}} is not valid.", call = call)

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    8x
                    
                      
  fmt_is_good

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Complex ARD Summaries

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' `r lifecycle::badge('experimental')`\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Function is similar to [ard_continuous()], but allows for more complex

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' summaries. While `ard_continuous(statistic)` only allows for a univariable

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' function, `ard_complex(statistic)` can handle more complex data summaries.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams ard_continuous

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param statistic ([`formula-list-selector`][syntax])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   The form of the statistics argument is identical to `ard_continuous(statistic)`

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   argument, except the summary function _must_ accept the following arguments:

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `x`: a vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `data`: the data frame that has been subset such that the `by`/`strata` columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'       and rows in which `"variable"` is `NA` have been removed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `data_full`: the full data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `by`: character vector of the `by` variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `strata`: character vector of the `strata` variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   It is unlikely any one function will need _all_ of the above elements,

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   and it's recommended the function passed accepts `...` so that any unused

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   arguments will be properly ignored. The `...` also allows this function

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   to perhaps be updated in the future with more passed arguments. For example,

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   if one needs a second variable from the data frame, the function inputs

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   may look like: `foo(x, data, ...)`

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' # example how to mimic behavior of `ard_continuous()`

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_complex(

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'   ADSL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = "ARM",

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = "AGE",

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'   statistic = list(AGE = list(mean = \(x, ...) mean(x)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' # return the grand mean and the mean within the `by` group

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' grand_mean <- function(data, data_full, variable, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'     mean = mean(data[[variable]], na.rm = TRUE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'     grand_mean = mean(data_full[[variable]], na.rm = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' ADSL |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'   dplyr::group_by(ARM) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_complex(

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'     variables = "AGE",

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'     statistic = list(AGE = list(means = grand_mean))

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
ard_complex <- function(data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
                        variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
                        by = dplyr::group_vars(data),

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
                        strata = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
                        statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
                        fmt_fn = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
                        stat_label = everything() ~ default_stat_labels()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    6x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    6x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    6x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(statistic)

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    6x
                    
                      
  check_data_frame(x = data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  # process inputs -------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    6x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(data, variables = {{ variables }})

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    6x
                    
                      
  process_formula_selectors(data[variables], statistic = statistic, allow_empty = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    6x
                    
                      
  missing_statistics_vars <- setdiff(variables, names(statistic))

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    6x
                    
                      
  if (!is_empty(missing_statistics_vars)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    1x
                    
                      
    "The following columns do not have {.arg statistic} defined: {.val {missing_statistics_vars}}." |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    1x
                    
                      
      cli::cli_abort()

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
  # calculate statistics -------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
  # first set an option to be used internally within `ard_continuous()`

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  # to calculate the statistics and pass multiple arguments to the

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
  # user-supplied functions in the `statistics` argument

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    5x
                    
                      
  old_option <- getOption("cards.calculate_stats_as_ard.eval_fun")

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    5x
                    
                      
  on.exit(options(cards.calculate_stats_as_ard.eval_fun = old_option), add = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    5x
                    
                      
  options(

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    5x
                    
                      
    cards.calculate_stats_as_ard.eval_fun =

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
    # putting the expr in quotes to avoid note about global variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    5x
                    
                      
      "do.call(fun, args = list(x = stats::na.omit(nested_data[[variable]]),
