                    84
                    5x
                    
                      
                                data = tidyr::drop_na(nested_data, any_of(variable)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    5x
                    
                      
                                data_full = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    5x
                    
                      
                                variable = variable,

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    5x
                    
                      
                                by = by,

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    5x
                    
                      
                                strata = strata))" |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    5x
                    
                      
        parse_expr()

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    5x
                    
                      
  ard_continuous(

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    5x
                    
                      
    data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    5x
                    
                      
    variables = all_of(variables),

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    5x
                    
                      
    by = {{ by }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    5x
                    
                      
    strata = {{ strata }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    5x
                    
                      
    statistic = statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    5x
                    
                      
    fmt_fn = fmt_fn,

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    5x
                    
                      
    stat_label = stat_label

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
  ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    5x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(context = "complex")

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Rounding of Numbers

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Rounds the values in its first argument to the specified number of

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' decimal places (default 0). Importantly, `round5()` **does not** use Base R's

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' "round to even" default. Standard rounding methods are implemented, for example,

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' `round5(0.5) = 1`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' Function inspired by `janitor::round_half_up()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`numeric`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   a numeric vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param digits (`integer`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   integer indicating the number of decimal places

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a numeric vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' x <- 0:4 / 2

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' round5(x) |> setNames(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' # compare results to Base R

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' round(x) |> setNames(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
round5 <- function(x, digits = 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    79x
                    
                      
  trunc(abs(x) * 10^digits + 0.5 + sqrt(.Machine$double.eps)) / 10^digits * sign(as.numeric(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' ARD Statistics as List

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Returns the statistics from an ARD as a named list.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... ([`dynamic-dots`][dyn-dots])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   optional arguments indicating rows to subset of the ARD.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   For example, to return only rows where the column `"AGEGR1"` is `"65-80"`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   pass `AGEGR1 %in% "65-80"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .column (`string`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   string indicating the column that will be returned in the list.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `"statistic"`

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .attributes (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   character vector of column names that will be returned

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   in the list as attributes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `NULL`

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @return named list

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' ard <- ard_categorical(ADSL, by = "ARM", variables = "AGEGR1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' get_ard_statistics(

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard,

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   group1_level %in% "Placebo",

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   variable_level %in% "65-80",

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'   .attributes = "stat_label"

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
get_ard_statistics <- function(x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
                               ...,

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
                               .column = "stat",

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
                               .attributes = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  # subset the ARD

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    6x
                    
                      
  ard_subset <- dplyr::filter(x, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
  # return a named list of the selected stats

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
  # add attributes for the label, formatting function, warnings, and errors

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    6x
                    
                      
  seq_len(nrow(ard_subset)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    6x
                    
                      
    lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    6x
                    
                      
      FUN = function(i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
        # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    14x
                    
                      
        ard_subset[[.column]][[i]] %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    14x
                    
                      
          {inject(structure(

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    14x
                    
                      
            ., !!!.create_list_for_attributes(ard_subset, .attributes, i)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
          ))}

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
      # styler: on

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    6x
                    
                      
    stats::setNames(ard_subset[["stat_name"]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' Create List for Attributes

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ard_subset (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' @param attributes (`character`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'   a character vector of attribute names

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' @param i (`integer`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'   a row index number

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a named list

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' ard <- ard_categorical(ADSL, by = "ARM", variables = "AGEGR1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.create_list_for_attributes(ard, c("group1", "group1_level"), 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
.create_list_for_attributes <- function(ard_subset, attributes, i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    14x
                    
                      
  ret <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    14x
                    
                      
  for (attr in seq_along(attributes)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
    ret <- c(ret, list(ard_subset[[attr]][[i]]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    14x
                    
                      
  stats::setNames(ret, nm = attributes)

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Dichotomous ARD Statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Compute Analysis Results Data (ARD) for dichotomous summary statistics.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams ard_categorical

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param value (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   named list of dichotomous values to tabulate. Default is `maximum_variable_value(data)`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   which returns the largest/last value after a sort.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_dichotomous(mtcars, by = vs, variables = c(cyl, am), value = list(cyl = 4))

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' mtcars |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   dplyr::group_by(vs) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_dichotomous(

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'     variables = c(cyl, am),

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'     value = list(cyl = 4),

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'     statistic = ~ categorical_summary_fns("p")

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
ard_dichotomous <- function(data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
                            variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
                            by = dplyr::group_vars(data),

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
                            strata = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
                            value = maximum_variable_value(data[variables]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
                            statistic = everything() ~ categorical_summary_fns(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
                            denominator = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
                            fmt_fn = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
                            stat_label = everything() ~ default_stat_labels()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    19x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    19x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    19x
                    
                      
  check_data_frame(x = data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
  # process inputs -------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    19x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(data, variables = {{ variables }})

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    19x
                    
                      
  process_formula_selectors(data[variables], value = value)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    19x
                    
                      
  fill_formula_selectors(

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    19x
                    
                      
    data = data[variables],

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    19x
                    
                      
    value = formals(cards::ard_dichotomous)[["value"]] |> eval()

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    19x
                    
                      
  .check_dichotomous_value(data, value)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
  # return empty tibble if no variables selected -------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    18x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(variables)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    !
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::tibble())

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
  # calculate summary statistics -----------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    18x
                    
                      
  ard_categorical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    18x
                    
                      
    data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    18x
                    
                      
    variables = all_of(variables),

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    18x
                    
                      
    by = {{ by }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    18x
                    
                      
    strata = {{ strata }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    18x
                    
                      
    statistic = statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    18x
                    
                      
    denominator = denominator,

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    18x
                    
                      
    fmt_fn = fmt_fn,

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    18x
                    
                      
    stat_label = stat_label

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
  ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    18x
                    
                      
    dplyr::filter(

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    18x
                    
                      
      pmap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    18x
                    
                      
        list(.data$variable, .data$variable_level),

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    18x
                    
                      
        function(variable, variable_level) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    294x
                    
                      
          variable_level %in% .env$value[[variable]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
      ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    18x
                    
                      
        unlist()

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    18x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(context = "dichotomous")

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' Maximum Value

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' For each column in the passed data frame, the function returns a named list

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' with the value being the largest/last element after a sort.

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' For factors, the last level is returned, and for logical vectors `TRUE` is returned.

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' This is used as the default value in `ard_dichotomous(value)` if not specified by

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#' the user.

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a named list

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' ADSL[c("AGEGR1", "BMIBLGR1")] |> maximum_variable_value()

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
maximum_variable_value <- function(data) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    34x
                    
                      
  data |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    34x
                    
                      
    lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    34x
                    
                      
      function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    40x
                    
                      
        if (inherits(x, "factor")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    1x
                    
                      
          return(levels(x) |> dplyr::last())

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    39x
                    
                      
        if (inherits(x, "logical")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    1x
                    
                      
          return(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    38x
                    
                      
        stats::na.omit(x) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    38x
                    
                      
          unique() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    38x
                    
                      
          sort() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    38x
                    
                      
          dplyr::last()

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#' Perform Value Checks

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#' Check the validity of the values passed in `ard_dichotomous(value)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' @param value (named `list`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#'   a named list

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' @param call (`environment`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#'   frame for error messaging. Default is [parent.frame()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#' @return returns invisible if check is successful, throws an error message if not.

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.check_dichotomous_value(mtcars, list(cyl = 4))

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
.check_dichotomous_value <- function(data, value, call = parent.frame()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    19x
                    
                      
  imap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    19x
                    
                      
    value,

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    19x
                    
                      
    function(value, column) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    23x
                    
                      
      accepted_values <- .unique_and_sorted(data[[column]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    23x
                    
                      
      if (length(value) != 1L || !value %in% accepted_values) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    1x
                    
                      
        message <- "Error in argument {.arg value} for variable {.val {column}}."

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    1x
                    
                      
        cli::cli_abort(

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    1x
                    
                      
          if (length(value) != 1L) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    1x
                    
                      
            c(message, "i" = "The value must be one of {.val {accepted_values}}.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
          } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    !
                    
                      
            c(message, "i" = "A value of {.val {value}} was passed, but must be one of {.val {accepted_values}}.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
          },

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    1x
                    
                      
          call = call

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
  ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    19x
                    
                      
    invisible()

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Evaluate and Capture Conditions

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Evaluates an expression while also capturing error and warning conditions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' Function always returns a named list `list(result=, warning=, error=)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' If there are no errors or warnings, those elements will be `NULL`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' If there is an error, the result element will be `NULL`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' Messages are neither saved nor printed to the console.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' Evaluation is done via [eval_tidy()]. If errors and warnings are produced

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' using the `{cli}` package, the messages are processed with `cli::ansi_strip()`

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' to remove styling from the message.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams rlang::eval_tidy

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a named list

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' # function executes without error or warning

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' eval_capture_conditions(letters[1:2])

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' # an error is thrown

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' eval_capture_conditions(stop("Example Error!"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' # if more than one warning is returned, all are saved

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' eval_capture_conditions({

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   warning("Warning 1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'   warning("Warning 2")

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'   letters[1:2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' })

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' # messages are not printed to the console

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' eval_capture_conditions({

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'   message("A message!")

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'   letters[1:2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' })

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
eval_capture_conditions <- function(expr, data = NULL, env = caller_env()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
  # IF WE EVER NEED TO REWORK/DEBUG REVIEW THE ADVANCED R CONDITIONS CHAPTER

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
  # https://adv-r.hadley.nz/conditions.html#conditions

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
  # initialize empty list to return

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    1134x
                    
                      
  lst_result <- list(result = NULL, warning = NULL, error = NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
  # tryCatch() saves error messages

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
  # withCallingHandlers() saves the warnings

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  # invokeRestart() suppresses the printing of warnings when code is resumed

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    1134x
                    
                      
  tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    1134x
                    
                      
    withCallingHandlers(

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    1134x
                    
                      
      expr = {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    1134x
                    
                      
        lst_result[["result"]] <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    1134x
                    
                      
          suppressMessages(eval_tidy({{ expr }}, data = data, env = env))

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
      },

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    1134x
                    
                      
      warning = function(w) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    3x
                    
                      
        lst_result[["warning"]] <<-

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
          # using `c()` to capture all warnings

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    3x
                    
                      
          c(lst_result[["warning"]], conditionMessage(w) |> cli::ansi_strip())

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    3x
                    
                      
        invokeRestart("muffleWarning")

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    1134x
                    
                      
    error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    6x
                    
                      
      lst_result[["error"]] <<- conditionMessage(e) |> cli::ansi_strip()

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
  # return named list of results

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    1134x
                    
                      
  lst_result

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Hierarchical ARD Statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Performs hierarchical or nested tabulations, e.g. tabulates AE terms

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' nested within AE system organ class.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' - `ard_hierarchical()` includes summaries for the last variable listed

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'   in the `variables` argument, nested within the other variables included.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' - `ard_hierarchical_count()` includes summaries for _all_ variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   listed in the `variables` argument each summary nested within the preceding

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables, e.g. `variables=c(AESOC, AETERM)` summarizes `AETERM` nested

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   in `AESOC`, and also summarizes the counts of `AESOC`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param variables ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables to perform the nested/hierarchical tabulations within.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param by ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables to perform tabulations by. All combinations of the variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   specified here appear in results. Default is `dplyr::group_vars(data)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams ard_categorical

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @name ard_hierarchical

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_hierarchical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   data = ADAE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = c(AESOC, AETERM),

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = c(TRTA, AESEV),

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   denominator = ADSL |> dplyr::rename(TRTA = ARM)

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_hierarchical_count(

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'   data = ADAE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables = c(AESOC, AETERM),

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = TRTA

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname ard_hierarchical

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
ard_hierarchical <- function(data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
                             variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
                             by = dplyr::group_vars(data),

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
                             statistic = everything() ~ categorical_summary_fns(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
                             denominator = NULL, fmt_fn = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
                             stat_label = everything() ~ default_stat_labels()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    6x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    6x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    6x
                    
                      
  check_data_frame(x = data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
  # process arguments ----------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    6x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    6x
                    
                      
    data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    6x
                    
                      
    variables = {{ variables }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    6x
                    
                      
    by = {{ by }}

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    6x
                    
                      
  data <- dplyr::ungroup(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  # return empty tibble if no variables selected -------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    6x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(variables)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::tibble())

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  # if denominator doesn't have all by, they need to be added ------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    5x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(denominator) && is.data.frame(denominator) && !all(by %in% names(denominator))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    1x
                    
                      
    by_vars_not_present <- by |> setdiff(names(denominator))

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    1x
                    
                      
    denominator <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    1x
                    
                      
      data |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    1x
                    
                      
      dplyr::select(all_of(by_vars_not_present)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    1x
                    
                      
      dplyr::distinct() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    1x
                    
                      
      dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    1x
                    
                      
        ...ard_data_column... = list(denominator)

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
      ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    1x
                    
                      
      tidyr::unnest(cols = "...ard_data_column...")

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  # add dummy variable for counting --------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    5x
                    
                      
  data[["...ard_dummy_for_counting..."]] <- 1L

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
  # perform tabulations --------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    5x
                    
                      
  df_result <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    5x
                    
                      
    ard_categorical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    5x
                    
                      
      data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    5x
                    
                      
      variables = "...ard_dummy_for_counting...",

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    5x
                    
                      
      by = all_of(by),

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    5x
                    
                      
      strata = all_of(variables),

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    5x
                    
                      
      statistic = statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    5x
                    
                      
      denominator = denominator,

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    5x
                    
                      
      fmt_fn = fmt_fn,

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    5x
                    
                      
      stat_label = stat_label

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
  # renaming columns -----------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    5x
                    
                      
  df_result <- .rename_last_group_as_variable(df_result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
  # return ard -----------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    5x
                    
                      
  df_result |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    5x
