    dplyr::mutate(context = "hierarchical")

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname ard_hierarchical

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
ard_hierarchical_count <- function(data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
                                   variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
                                   by = dplyr::group_vars(data),

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
                                   fmt_fn = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
                                   stat_label = everything() ~ default_stat_labels()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    6x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    6x
                    
                      
  check_not_missing(variables)

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    6x
                    
                      
  check_data_frame(x = data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
  # process arguments ----------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    6x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    6x
                    
                      
    data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    6x
                    
                      
    variables = {{ variables }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    6x
                    
                      
    by = {{ by }}

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
  # return empty tibble if no variables selected -------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    6x
                    
                      
  if (is_empty(variables)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(dplyr::tibble())

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
  # add dummy variable for counting --------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    5x
                    
                      
  data[["...ard_dummy_for_counting..."]] <- 1L

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
  # perform tabulations --------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    5x
                    
                      
  seq_along(variables) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    5x
                    
                      
    rev() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    5x
                    
                      
    lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    5x
                    
                      
      function(i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    10x
                    
                      
        ard_categorical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    10x
                    
                      
          data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    10x
                    
                      
          variables = "...ard_dummy_for_counting...",

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    10x
                    
                      
          by = all_of(by),

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    10x
                    
                      
          strata = all_of(variables[seq_len(i)]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    10x
                    
                      
          statistic = everything() ~ categorical_summary_fns("n"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    10x
                    
                      
          fmt_fn = fmt_fn,

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    10x
                    
                      
          stat_label = stat_label

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
        ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    10x
                    
                      
          .rename_last_group_as_variable()

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    5x
                    
                      
    bind_ard() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    5x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(context = "hierarchical_count") %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    5x
                    
                      
    {structure(., class = unique(c("card", class(.))))} # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#' Rename Last Group to Variable

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#' In the `ard_hierarchical*()` functions, the last grouping variable is

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#' renamed to `variable` and `variable_level` before being returned.

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#' @param df_result (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- data.frame(x = 1, y = 2, group1 = 3, group2 = 4)

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
#' cards:::.rename_last_group_as_variable(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
.rename_last_group_as_variable <- function(df_result) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    15x
                    
                      
  df_result <- dplyr::select(df_result, -all_ard_variables())

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    15x
                    
                      
  last_two_grouping_columns <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    15x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(df_result, all_ard_groups()) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    15x
                    
                      
    names() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    15x
                    
                      
    utils::tail(n = 2L) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    15x
                    
                      
    stats::setNames(c("variable", "variable_level"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    15x
                    
                      
  dplyr::rename(df_result, !!!last_two_grouping_columns)

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Bind ARDs

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Wrapper for `dplyr::bind_rows()` with additional checks

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' for duplicated statistics.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... ([`dynamic-dots`][dyn-dots])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   ARDs to combine. Each argument can either be an ARD,

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   or a list of ARDs. Columns are matched by name, and any missing

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   columns will be filled with `NA`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .update (`logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   logical indicating whether to update duplicate ARD statistics.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `FALSE`. If a statistic type is repeated and `.update=TRUE`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   the more recently added statistics will be retained, and the others omitted.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .order (`logical`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   logical indicating whether to order the rows of the stacked ARDs, allowing

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   statistics that share common group and variable values to appear in

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   consecutive rows. Default is `FALSE`. Ordering will be based on the order

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   of the group/variable values prior to stacking.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' ard <- ard_categorical(ADSL, by = "ARM", variables = "AGEGR1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' bind_ard(ard, ard, .update = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
bind_ard <- function(..., .update = FALSE, .order = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    24x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(.update)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    23x
                    
                      
  check_scalar_logical(.order)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  # stack ARDs -----------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    23x
                    
                      
  data <- dplyr::bind_rows(...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  # check for duplicates -------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    23x
                    
                      
  dupes <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    23x
                    
                      
    dplyr::select(data, all_ard_groups(), all_ard_variables(), "stat_name")[seq(nrow(data), 1L), ] |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    23x
                    
                      
    duplicated()

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    23x
                    
                      
  if (any(dupes) && isTRUE(.update)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    1x
                    
                      
    cli::cli_inform(c("i" = "{sum(dupes)} duplicate observation{?/s} removed."))

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    1x
                    
                      
    data <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    1x
                    
                      
      dplyr::filter(

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    1x
                    
                      
        data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    1x
                    
                      
        .by = c(all_ard_groups(), all_ard_variables(), "stat_name"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    1x
                    
                      
        dplyr::row_number() == dplyr::n()

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    22x
                    
                      
  } else if (any(dupes) && isFALSE(.update)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    !
                    
                      
    cli::cli_abort(c("!" = "{sum(dupes)} duplicate observation{?/s} found."))

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
  # optionally reorder ---------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    23x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(.order)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    6x
                    
                      
    data <- tidy_ard_row_order(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  # return stacked ARDs --------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    23x
                    
                      
  tidy_ard_column_order(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Replace NULL Statistics with Specified Value

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' When a statistical summary function errors, the `"statistic"` column will be

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' `NULL`. It is, however, sometimes useful to replace these values with a

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' non-`NULL` value, e.g. `NA`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`data.frame`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param value (usually a `scalar`)\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   The value to replace `NULL` values with. Default is `NA`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param rows ([`data-masking`][rlang::args_data_masking])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   Expression that return a logical value, and are defined in terms of the variables in `.data`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   Only rows for which the condition evaluates to `TRUE` are replaced.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   Default is `TRUE`, which applies to all rows.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' # the quantile functions error because the input is character, while the median function returns NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' data.frame(x = rep_len(NA_character_, 10)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_continuous(

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'     variables = x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'     statistic = ~ continuous_summary_fns(c("median", "p25", "p75"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   replace_null_statistic(rows = !is.null(error))

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
replace_null_statistic <- function(x, value = NA, rows = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  # check inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    1x
                    
                      
  check_class(x, "card")

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  # replace NULL values --------------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    1x
                    
                      
  x |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    1x
                    
                      
    dplyr::rowwise() |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    1x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
      # styler: off

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    1x
                    
                      
      stat =

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    1x
                    
                      
        if (is.null(.data$stat) && {{ rows }}) list(.env$value)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    1x
                    
                      
        else list(.data$stat)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
      # styler: on

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
    # restore previous grouping structure and original class of x

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    1x
                    
                      
    dplyr::group_by(dplyr::pick(dplyr::group_vars(x))) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    1x
                    
                      
    structure(class = class(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Missing ARD Statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Compute Analysis Results Data (ARD) for statistics related to data missingness.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams ard_continuous

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param by ([`tidy-select`][dplyr::dplyr_tidy_select])\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   results are tabulated by **all combinations** of the columns specified.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @return an ARD data frame of class 'card'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' ard_missing(ADSL, by = "ARM", variables = "AGE")

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' ADSL |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   dplyr::group_by(ARM) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   ard_missing(

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'     variables = "AGE",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'     statistic = ~ missing_summary_fns("N_miss")

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
ard_missing <- function(data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
                        variables,

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
                        by = dplyr::group_vars(data),

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
                        statistic = everything() ~ missing_summary_fns(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
                        fmt_fn = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
                        stat_label = everything() ~ default_stat_labels()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  # process variable inputs ----------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    6x
                    
                      
  process_selectors(data, variables = {{ variables }})

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
  # convert all variables to T/F whether it's missing --------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    6x
                    
                      
  data <- data |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    6x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    6x
                    
                      
      across(all_of(variables), Negate(is.na))

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
  # get the summary statistics -------------------------------------------------

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    6x
                    
                      
  ard_continuous(

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    6x
                    
                      
    data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    6x
                    
                      
    variables = all_of(variables),

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    6x
                    
                      
    by = {{ by }},

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    6x
                    
                      
    statistic = statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    6x
                    
                      
    fmt_fn = fmt_fn,

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    6x
                    
                      
    stat_label = stat_label

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
  ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    6x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    6x
                    
                      
      context = "missing"

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Defaults for Statistical Arguments

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Returns a named list of statistics labels

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @return named list

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' # stat labels

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' default_stat_labels()

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
default_stat_labels <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    24636x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    24636x
                    
                      
    mean = "Mean",

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    24636x
                    
                      
    sd = "SD",

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    24636x
                    
                      
    var = "Variance",

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    24636x
                    
                      
    median = "Median",

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    24636x
                    
                      
    p25 = "25th Percentile",

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    24636x
                    
                      
    p75 = "75th Percentile",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    24636x
                    
                      
    min = "Min",

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    24636x
                    
                      
    max = "Max",

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    24636x
                    
                      
    n = "n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    24636x
                    
                      
    N = "N",

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    24636x
                    
                      
    p = "%",

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    24636x
                    
                      
    N_obs = "Vector Length",

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    24636x
                    
                      
    N_miss = "N Missing",

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    24636x
                    
                      
    N_nonmiss = "N Non-missing",

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    24636x
                    
                      
    p_miss = "% Missing",

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    24636x
                    
                      
    p_nonmiss = "% Non-missing"

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
}
